Mythic, and Emblem events after 40 summons.

Get a Hero listed below for free
when subscribed to Feh Pass.

Once inherited, an arcane weapon
can't be re-inherited by another Hero.
Attuned Skills can be inherited once.

Inheriting Skills:
An ally can inherit up to five
skills at a time from another
ally. You'll lose the ally
donating any skills.

Inherited skills are added to
the recipient's skill list. They
are learned like any other skill
but require 1.5x the usual SP.

Warning:
When transferring skills that have
prerequisite skills via Inherit Skills,
prerequisite skills must also be
transferred. For example, if you
wish to transfer Life and Death 4,
target Hero must already have the
skills Life and Death 1, 2, and 3.

Elite-Inheritance Restrictions:
Only Rearmed Heroes and
Attuned Heroes can equip both
their arcane weapon and an
exclusive skill (such as Gray
Waves, etc.) other than Sing,
Dance, or Play at the same time.

Elite-Inheritance Restrictions:
Only Rearmed Heroes and
Attuned Heroes can equip both
their Attuned Skill and an
exclusive skill (such as Gray
Waves, etc.) other than Sing,
Dance, or Play at the same time.
Select up to five skills to inherit.
